SelectionModes.Mode: Select BugID {COL BugID TITLE "NrAnomal"}, DescriptionLOC {COL DescriptionLOC TITLE "Descrizione"}, FunctionalAreas {COL FunctionalAreas TITLE "Ambiente"}, CurrProductCode {COL CurrProductCode TITLE "ProductCode"}, BugsStatus {COL BugsStatus TYPE Enum[508] TITLE "Stato" }, Build {COL Build} From PAI_VwBugsProdRelease Where FoundDuringTest = '0' Order by BugID DESC
